name: Ancient Technical Bracer

items.alias: Ancient Scrap of Saturated Spirit Knowledge
Ancient Scrap of Condensed Spirit Knowledge
Ancient Scrap of Spirit Technical Knowledge

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ All parts required for this process can be found in Albtraum. You will need to build an Ancient Engineering Device as well if you do not have one already. A link to this tradeskill process is included #L "Crystalised Memories of a Technician" "267698" #L "Crystalised Memories of a Mechanic" "267701" #L "Ancient Scrap of Spirit Knowledge" "267677" #L "Ancient Scrap of Saturated Spirit Knowledge" "267679" #L "Inactive Ancient Bracer" "267746" #L "Inert Knowledge Crystal" "267737" #L "Ancient Engineering Device" "267751" Note:To build your Ancient Engineering Device, go here: #L "Ancient Engineering Device" "/tell recipe 594" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Crystalised Memories of a Technician + Crystalised Memories of a Mechanic = #L "Combined Crystalised Technical Memories" "267702" Skills: | 1875 NP | Ancient Scrap of Spirit Knowledge + Ancient Scrap of Saturated Spirit Knowledge = #L "Ancient Scrap of Condensed Spirit Knowledge" "267680" Skills: | 1750 PT | Combined Crystalised Technical Memories + Ancient Scrap of Condensed Spirit Knowledge = #L "Ancient Scrap of Spirit Technical Knowledge" "267703" Skills: | 1875 NP | Ancient Scrap of Spirit Technical Knowledge + Inert Knowledge Crystal = #L "Technical Knowledge Crystal" "267740" Skills: | 1750 CH | Ancient Engineering Device + Inactive Ancient Bracer = #L "Active Ancient Bracer" "267747" Skills: | 1500 ME | Active Ancient Bracer + Technical Knowledge Crystal = #L "Ancient Technical Bracer" "267754" Skills: | 1250 ME |
